item.title: Cheat Sheet: Org-mode
item.description: Line wrapping To make sure long sentences stay on your screen. M-x visual-line-mode Add a link to a file on your computer C-u C-c C-l Set global ID to a header to which you can reference from different a .org file Use C-c l to copy a todo with an ID, which can be pasted somewhere as reference with C-c C-l Put this code in your init.el:
